nodes.bodyText: Any reason to disable the tests.

ballerina-lang runtime version 0.5.0 and this also uses the same method. So, these tests are failing. But these tests are already moved to the runtime repo other than this. We need to move this missed test also. We have found this issue if this test had moved already. We are maintaining this repo for other dependent modules and not used to pack. I think it is no big issue. @daneshk  Can I proceed with this?
We are not maintaining this code. Eventually, this will remove from ballerina-lang. So it's ok to disable
What is the usage of this constant? . can't we remove this
Now, we can't remove this as getCallStack() is using this. So we need to implement this method properly.
